sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import {useState} from 'react'; import {useSelector} from "react-redux"; const EditProfile = () => { const person = useSelector((state) =>state.person ) const[firstName,setFirstName] = useState(person.firstName); const[lastName,setLastName] = useState(person.lastName); const[bio,setBio] = useState(person.bio); const[location,setLocation] = useState(person.location); const[website,setWebsite] = useState(person.website); var datestring = new Date(person.dateOfBirth).toString().split(" "); var month = datestring[1] var date = datestring[2] var year = datestring[3] const handleNameChange=(event)=>{ const newValue = event.target.value; setFirstName(newValue) } return(
· Edit {month} {date}, {year}
); } export default EditProfile;
